alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 6:00AM EST until March 09 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Ohio, including the following county, Stark. * WHEN...Until 915 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 600 AM EST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Canton, North Canton and Meyers Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
